item.title: How to Publish a Pelican Blog using Github Pages
item.description: Warning This article may contain outdated information. Also, I have migrated from Pelican to Hugo. You can read pelican official documentation here. In this tutorial, I will be showing how to use pelican to create your own blog and how to publish your blog on Github Pages. Some paragraphs will be directly borrowed from other websites which I will reference as footnotes. About Pelican & Github Pages Pelican Pelican is a static site generator implemented in Python that combines Jinja templates with content written in Markdown or reStructuredText to produce websites.
